name: ff-pyload
title: Pyload for Firefox
description: Pyload for Firefox utilizing the webinterface API.
author: Pinetrax

preferences.name: address
preferences.title: Address of your pyload webinterface
preferences.description: Put in IP:Port or webaddress of your pyload webinterface.
Put in IP:Port or webadress of your pyload webinterface.

preferences.name: ssl
preferences.title: Use SSL
preferences.description: If enabled on your server, use ssl to connect. (needed if enabled)

preferences.name: savepw
preferences.title: Save password
preferences.description: If you don't want the addon to save your password, uncheck this.

preferences.name: buttonopt
preferences.title: Configure buttons onclick action
preferences.description: If set for the popup, a button there will bring you to the built-in webinterface.

preferences.name: captchatime
preferences.title: Check interval for captchas
preferences.description: Set time in seconds to check for captchas and put out a notification.
